film condensed: Young Katherine recites prime numbers.
reality condensed: She loved numbers from childhood.

film condensed: Katherine gets into the WVCI, skipping 2 grades.
reality condensed: She won a spot at WVCI, jumping from 6th to 8th grade.

film condensed: Katherine wows the classroom with her skills.
reality condensed: She was top of her class.

film condensed: Katherine's parents collect her from school.
reality condensed: Her parents supported her education in every way.

film condensed: Katherine, Mary & Dorothy fix their broken-down car on the way to work.
reality condensed: They didn't commute together.

film condensed: The women get pulled by a police officer.
reality condensed: Didn't happen, but wouldn't have been unusual.

film condensed: Mary tailgates the officer all the way to Langley.
reality condensed: Didn't happen.

film condensed: The Russians launch Sputnik.
reality condensed: It launched in 1957.

film condensed: Sputnik manages its first orbit.
reality condensed: It eventually completed several, although earlier on.

film condensed: NASA director is furious the Russians are winning.
reality condensed: Everybody feared what would happen if the US didn't catch up.

film condensed: Harrison awaits the IBM.
reality condensed: Langley got its first IBM machines in the mid-1950s.

film condensed: Dorothy recommends Katherine for the Space Task Group.
reality condensed: She did, but much earlier when it was still the Flight Research Division.

film condensed: Dorothy chases the supervisor position.
reality condensed: She had to wait two years to get it.

film condensed: Mary works on the Mach 1 tunnel tests.
reality condensed: She was offered the job by Czarnecki.

film condensed: Mary's shoe gets stuck in the vent.
reality condensed: Didn't happen.

film condensed: Zielinski encourages Mary to join the engineer training program.
reality condensed: Her boss did support her application for the program.

film condensed: Katherine joins the Space Task Group as the first & only black woman.
reality condensed: She was chosen for her mathematical brilliance.

film condensed: The office is full of white men - she really stands out.
reality condensed: There were a few women actually, but Katherine was the only black woman.

film condensed: Stafford resents a black woman checking his work.
reality condensed: Katherine never experienced racist attitudes at Langley.

film condensed: Mercury 7 are due to arrive for training.
reality condensed: The 7 set up at NASA HQ to train & prepare for their missions.

film condensed: Katherine is asked to check redacted reports.
reality condensed: We couldn't find sources for this.

film condensed: Katherine sets out to find the black bathrooms.
reality condensed: Katherine never used the black bathrooms.

film condensed: Katherine runs the half mile to the black bathrooms.
reality condensed: Katherine never used the black bathrooms.

film condensed: Katherine gets yelled out for taking so long in the bathroom.
reality condensed: Katherine never used the black bathrooms.

film condensed: Katherine grabs a coffee from the dispenser, it doesn't go down well.
reality condensed: This isn't in the book.

film condensed: Harrison & Katherine stay late & talk.
reality condensed: She didn't work that closely with the directors.

film condensed: Dorothy & Mary wait for Katherine, drive home together.
reality condensed: They didn't share the commute.

film condensed: Katherine gets home, talks to her mother.
reality condensed: She lived with her mother at some point.

film condensed: Katherine talks to her 3 children.
reality condensed: She had three kids with her first husband.

film condensed: The pastor at church introduces Johnson.
reality condensed: Katherine met Johnson in church.

film condensed: Mary & Jackson argue about the training program.
reality condensed: We couldn't find sources for this.

film condensed: Katherine & Johnson talk at a church lunch.
reality condensed: They did attend meet through church.

film condensed: Johnson asks Katherine about work, unintentionally insults her.
reality condensed: She was private about her private life.

film condensed: Glenn insists on meeting the black staff as well as the white.
reality condensed: We couldn't find sources for this.

film condensed: Katherine discovers the coffee table has been segregated.
reality condensed: This didn't happen.

film condensed: Katherine makes out a redacted word, has a lightbulb moment.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: They have to smash the wall to fit the IBM in the room.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: Dorothy asks Vivian about the IBM.
reality condensed: Dorothy was keen to learn all there was to know about the IBM.

film condensed: Katherine cracks the numbers for Shepard's trajectory.
reality condensed: She did the calcs for his mission.

film condensed: Katherine is questioned about the information she used.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: Katherine, Mary & Dorothy take lunch in the black canteen.
reality condensed: The canteens were segregated.

film condensed: Mary needs an extension course to apply for the program.
reality condensed: She had to do the course to get onto the training program.

film condensed: Dorothy tells Mary to petition for access to the extension course.
reality condensed: As a black woman, Mary needed permission to attend classes.

film condensed: The women bake, drink hooch & dance.
reality condensed: The three women didn't hang out much.

film condensed: Dorothy & sons see an anti-segregation protest.
reality condensed: Protests were everywhere in the 1960s.

film condensed: Dorothy is thrown out of the white section of the library.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: Dorothy has stolen the book she was after.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: Dorothy invites Johnson to a party so he can talk to Katherine.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: Johnson apologises to Katherine for his earlier comments.
reality condensed: She was private about her private life.

film condensed: Yuri Gagarin becomes the first man in space.
reality condensed: He won the title in 1961 when he orbitted the earth.

film condensed: The NASA team watch TV footage of Russia's win.
reality condensed: They followed every second.

film condensed: Harrison tells his team it's game on.
reality condensed: JFK promised the USA would get to the moon, the pressure was on.

film condensed: Katherine calls home to say she'd be late.
reality condensed: Johnson understood Katherine's commitment.

film condensed: Montage of testing, calcs, press conferences...
reality condensed: It took 1.2m tests, calcs, experiments etc to get the US into space.

film condensed: Mary petitions the court.
reality condensed: She filed with the City of Hampton.

film condensed: Dorothy sneaks into the IBM room to figure out the programming.
reality condensed: She did learn the programming, but she didn't have to 'sneak'.

film condensed: Dorothy starts teaching her 'girls' to program the IBM.
reality condensed: Dorothy did train others to use the IBM.

film condensed: Mary tells her boss she got a court date.
reality condensed: Czarnecki supported her application.

film condensed: The IBM wasn't working, Dorothy fixes it.
reality condensed: It was working fine.

film condensed: Katherine runs to the black bathrooms in torrential rain.
reality condensed: Katherine never used the black bathrooms.

film condensed: Katherine rages to Harrisson about the injustices of segregation.
reality condensed: She didn't personally experience the effects of racism at Langley.

film condensed: Harrison removes the 'coloured' label from the coffee pot.
reality condensed: The directors themselves didn't remove any labels.

film condensed: Harrison smashes the 'coloured bathroom' signs.
reality condensed: The NASA directors didn't smash any signs, but they were removed.

film condensed: Katherine & Johnson eat with the family, she has flu.
reality condensed: She was private about her private life.

film condensed: Shepard launches.
reality condensed: His flight lasted 15m22s & covered 303miles.

film condensed: The launch is a success.
reality condensed: Everybody celebrated.

film condensed: Harrrison congratulated the team.
reality condensed: We're assuming NASA bigwigs congratulated their teams.

film condensed: Johnson & Katherine kiss for the first time.
reality condensed: At some stage yeah, likely.

film condensed: 4 white men are arrested for bombing a freedom rider bus.
reality condensed: It happened in May 1961.

film condensed: Mary wins her court case.
reality condensed: The City granted her special access to the course.

film condensed: Katherine adds her name to a report.
reality condensed: Her name was one of few women's to be included on a report at the time.

film condensed: Katherine persuades Harrison to let her work on Glenn's trajectory.
reality condensed: The bosses trusted her to get it right.

film condensed: Stafford tears the author page off the report.
reality condensed: Women didn't author reports.

film condensed: Grissom's Liberty Bell 7 sinks in the ocean.
reality condensed: It wasn't salvaged until 1999.

film condensed: Harrison points out it's worth the money to get ahead of Russia.
reality condensed: NASA's budget was crazy high at the time.

film condensed: They try to figure out getting Glenn back down from orbit.
reality condensed: This was the toughest calculation to date.

film condensed: Katherine begs to attend briefings, is turned down.
reality condensed: She was initially told no.

film condensed: Dorothy singlehandedly gets the IBM working.
reality condensed: A whole team worked on getting the IBM going.

film condensed: Katherine asks, again, to attend briefings.
reality condensed: Again, her plea is rejected.

film condensed: Katherine adds her name to a report.
reality condensed: Her name was one of few women's to be included on a report at the time.

film condensed: Stafford & Katherine argue about the names on the report.
reality condensed: Women didn't author reports.

film condensed: Finally Katherine is allowed to attend briefings.
reality condensed: The engineers eventually got sick of her asking & said yes.

film condensed: Katherine wows a room of bigwigs with her calcs.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: Harrison tells the IBM guys to find more programmers.
reality condensed: The IBM needed a huge team of programmers.

film condensed: Dorothy is officially assigned to the IBM.
reality condensed: She ended up in the IBM team.

film condensed: Dorothy's team file over to the IBM room.
reality condensed: A throwback to an earlier movie.

film condensed: Harrison reminds Stafford to play nicely.
reality condensed: NASA nurtured genius.

film condensed: Jackson & Mary share a tender moment.
reality condensed: We don't know much about Mary's relationship with her husband.

film condensed: Mary enters a classroom of white men.
reality condensed: She was the first & only woman, & black person, in those classes.

film condensed: Katherine uses Euler's method to crack the trajectory.
reality condensed: Katherine did use Euler's method to calculate the trajectory they needed.

film condensed: Katherine omits her name from the report.
reality condensed: Women computers' names were usually left off reports.

film condensed: Dorothy & Vivian have an awkward chat in the ladies'.
reality condensed: Desegration was uncomfortable.

film condensed: Johnson proposes to Katherine in front of her family.
reality condensed: We don't know how the proposal went down, but it did happen.

film condensed: Glenn prepares for launch.
reality condensed: He had days' worth of preparation for the launch.

film condensed: Harrison tells Katherine she's no longer needed now they have the IBM.
reality condensed: The IBM needed humans & vice versa.

film condensed: Ruth hands Katherine pearls from Harrison.
reality condensed: Harrison didn't give Katherine pearls.

film condensed: Katherine's wedding day.
reality condensed: This was her second marriage.

film condensed: The women tune in to watch Glenn's launch.
reality condensed: Unprecedented numbers tuned it to follow the event.

film condensed: Glenn refuses to take off without Katherine checking the numbers.
reality condensed: He trusted Katherine more than the IBM.

film condensed: Katherine rushes through the numbers last minute.
reality condensed: She did check the numbers, but not last minute.

film condensed: Katherine races to get the numbers to control.
reality condensed: Katherine confirmed Glenn's numbers.

film condensed: Harrison gives Katherine a pass for the control room.
reality condensed: Not in the book.

film condensed: With the numbers confirmed by Katherine, Glenn is happy to launch.
reality condensed: Glenn trusted her calcs totally.

film condensed: The launch is a success.
reality condensed: Glenn launched at 9.47am on Feb 20th 1962 & made it into orbit.

film condensed: Dorothy finally gets her supervisor title.
reality condensed: It happened earlier than this, but she waited 2yrs for it.

film condensed: A heat shield warning light appears in Glenn's capsule.
reality condensed: Glenn was in huge danger.

film condensed: Communication is lost & a fireball consumes the capsule.
reality condensed: Glenn prepared himself for death at that point.

film condensed: Glenn makes it, splashes down safely.
reality condensed: Glenn came back online 14m after losing the protective rocket pack.

film condensed: Harrison asks Katherine if they can get to the moon next.
reality condensed: Katherine was kept on board for the moon mission.

film condensed: The three women had amazing careers.
reality condensed: All achieved big things.

film condensed: Katherine won the Presidential Medal of Freedom at 97 years old.
reality condensed: She was given the country's highest honour in 2015.
